name: jobberBase
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: jobberBase is the open-source job board software that helps you set up a jobsite in minutes!

matches.regexp: (?-mix:Proudly powered by[\s]+<a href="http:\/\/www.jobberbase.com\/"[^>]*title="open source job board software">jobberBase<\/a>)
